actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to permit the conversion of outdoor recreation property to enclosed or indoor property.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior, under the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act, to permit the conversion of outdoor recreation property to enclosed or indoor property if he finds that extreme weather conditions (including frequent snowy and icy conditions in the area) would render it difficult to maintain the property in question for outdoor recreation uses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to permit the conversion of outdoor recreation property to enclosed or indoor property.
